snippet: Faiza N. Ali, a Muslim trained by a Jewish agency to work with a coalition of mostly Christian churches, is a community organizer trying to increase the impact of the religious left in policy debates.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column profiles Faiza N Ali, devout Muslim who was hired by Jewish agency Bend the Arc to build coalitions of various faiths in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Faiza N. Ali, a Muslim trained by a Jewish agency to work with a coalition of mostly Christian churches, is a community organizer trying to increase the impact of the religious left in policy debates.

headline.print_headline: Muslim Woman Bridges Faiths to Advance Progressive Goals
headline.seo: Faiza Ali Uses Faith to Unite Religious Coalitions
headline.main: Muslim Woman Bridges Faiths to Advance Progressive Goals
